content: अक्षि {%<ab>n.</ab>%} [अश्नुते विषयान्; अश्-क्सि, अशोर्णित् <ls>Uṇ. 3. 155-6</ls>] अक्षिणी, अक्षीणि अक्ष्णा, अक्ष्णः &c. {@--1@} The eye (which grasps or sees objects); changed to अक्ष at the end of Bahuvrīhi Comp; {%<ab>f.</ab>%} °क्षी when a limb of the body is indicated, as जलजाक्षी, otherwise दीर्घाक्षावेणुयष्टिः; in <ab>Avyayī.</ab> <ab>comp.</ab> also it is changed to अक्ष, (समक्षं, परोक्षं &c.). {@--2@} The number two; (--क्षिणी) the sun and moon. [<ab>cf.</ab> <ab>L.</ab> {%oculus%}; <ab>Germ.</ab> {%auge%}; <ab>Gr.</ab> {%okos%}, {%okkos%}, Zend {%ashi%}.]
